javelin.view.screen.haxor

Class SummonAlly

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.view.screen.Option
      • javelin.view.screen.haxor.Hax
        • javelin.view.screen.haxor.SummonAlly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SummonAlly
extends Hax
    One-time offer to recruit one extra starting squad member from the starting character set. This is an exception to the rule of not having balance-related features on Haxor's temple but some players may find the start of the game too slow - this would enable them to use their starting ticket to speed up the early game.
    See Also:
    SquadScreen, Serialized Form
